name: ngx-advanced-img-sample

scripts.build-publish: npm run build-publish-npmjs && npm run build-publish-github
scripts._build-publish: ng build ngx-advanced-img --configuration=production && cd dist/ngx-advanced-img/ && npm publish && cd ../.. && rm -rf ./dist
scripts.build-publish-npmjs: sed -i '' 's/"name": "ngx-advanced-img"/"name": "ngx-advanced-img"/' projects/ngx-advanced-img/package.json && npm run _build-publish; git checkout -- ./projects/ngx-advanced-img/package.json
scripts.build-publish-github: sed -i '' 's/"name": "[^"]*"/"name": "@bmartinson\/ngx-advanced-img"/' projects/ngx-advanced-img/package.json && npm run _build-publish; git checkout -- ./projects/ngx-advanced-img/package.json
scripts.lint: ng lint --fix ngx-advanced-img-sample; ng lint --fix ngx-advanced-img

author: Brian Martinson <brian@brianmartinson.com> (https://brianmartinson.com/)
description: An Angular directive library for advanced img feature extensions.
